Fernando Díaz de Mendoza y Aguado https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fernando_D%C3%ADaz_de_Mendoza_y_Aguado 0 Fernando Díaz de Mendoza y Aguado (7 June 1862 – 20 October 1930) was a Spanish actor, impresario and theatre director. According to some critics he was one of the twentieth century's best actors. Fernando_Díaz de Mendoza_y_Aguado ( 7_June_1862 – 20_October_1930 ) was a_Spanish_actor_,_impresario_and_theatre_director . According to some_critics he was one of the_twentieth_century 's_best_actors .
